summary: SummaryThe Moroccanoil Perfectly Polished Titanium Flat Iron is a versatile styling tool for creating a range of flawless, frizz-free styles—from effortless straight looks to soft waves and curls. The extra-long, 4-inch titanium plates deliver fast performance and even heat distribution.
details: DetailsBenefitsDigital display for precise temperature control up to 450°F / 230°CTitanium provides quick heat transfer, superior heat conduction, and an effortless glide for silky, frizz-free stylesFloating plates with beveled edges provide a smooth glide and styling versatilityFeatures1 hour automatic shut-off for worry-free stylingHeats quickly in under 60 secondsAuto heat recovery for consistent temperature during useWorldwide voltageErgonomic soft-touch grip9-foot swivel cordIncludes a heat-resistant pouchItem 2644235How To UseThe Perfectly Polished Titanium Flat Iron may be used two ways.To straighten and smooth hair:Divide hair into small sections. Be sure to take fine subsections.Select desired temperature. (Fine hair = lower heat setting; medium to coarse hair = higher heat setting).Starting at the base of one section, lightly spray one pump of Perfect Defense 8--10 inches (20--25 cm) away from hair. Close the flat iron at the base and glide it through the ends, repeating until desired smoothness is achieved. Continue working in the same manner in all sections.To create soft waves and curls:Divide hair into small sections and lightly spray Perfect Defense throughout.Select desired temperature. (Fine hair = lower heat setting; medium to coarse hair = higher heat setting).Take an appropriate-size subsection and place the iron in a section where the curl is to begin.Lightly close the iron and turn it one quarter or half of a rotation in the desired curl direction (away from or toward the face), working through the ends and all other sections of hair.
